mapper.select: SELECT user_id, password_hash, name, email, dept_id, position, status, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees (user_id, password_hash, name, email, dept_id, position, status, hire_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{passwordHash}, #{name}, #{email}, #{deptId}, #{position}, #{status}, #{hireDate})
